script.speaker: Sundar Pichai
script.text: Next up, we have Andrea, a Google Data Engineer all the way from London, but originally from Italy! Andrea's going to perform an acoustic version of 'Somebody to Love' by Queen. He's even added a little data twist to the lyrics, which I'm sure our judges will appreciate.  He's dedicating this performance to Sara, and let's just say he's hoping for more than just a standing ovation!

script.speaker: Billie Joe Armstrong
script.text: Whoa, Andrea! You weren't kidding about that data twist, were you?  Pretty clever, man. I gotta admit, I wasn't expecting that!

script.speaker: Dave Grohl
script.text: Ha! 'Find some data to flow' - nice one, Andrea! You know how to win over the techies in the crowd.  But seriously, you got a great voice, man.  Freddie would approve.

script.speaker: Alanis Morissette
script.text: The vulnerability in your voice was really beautiful, Andrea. You made that song your own. And the dedication to Sara? So sweet!

script.speaker: Sara Bareilles
script.text: Oh my gosh, Andrea, thank you! You really had me blushing back here.  That was a really special performance.  And the data engineer thing? Definitely a plus!

script.speaker: Sundar Pichai
script.text: It sounds like Andrea might need to find some extra bandwidth for all the attention he's getting! Judges, what do you say?  Is it a yes for Andrea?

script.speaker: Billie Joe Armstrong
script.text: Dude, you got guts coming up here with a Queen song, and you totally owned it.  It's a yes from me!

script.speaker: Dave Grohl
script.text: I'm with Billie.  Great voice, great energy, and you even made me laugh.  Definitely a yes!

script.speaker: Alanis Morissette
script.text: You poured your heart into that performance, Andrea.  A big yes from me.

script.speaker: Sara Bareilles
script.text: Andrea, you're incredibly talented and charming.  It's a yes!  And maybe we can talk data flow later...

script.speaker: Sundar Pichai
script.text: Four yeses, Andrea! Looks like your data finally found a flow straight to the next round! Congratulations!
